body.p: Open AI GPT3 is the largest commercial AI model available to integrators. It was trained on a huge corpus of text.
Advantages (of the Open AI GPT-3 Language Model):

Disadvantages:
Slow due to network latency since content is sent to Open AI servers. Check the license terms of the Open AI platform to make sure your company agrees with sending parts of the edited document to the Open AI.
Not always factually correct since it uses probabilistic responses.Always check the generated content. It behaves more like a brain than a database.

To use the GTP-3 language models:
Go in the Oxygen Smart Autocomplete preferences page and setup the following areas:
API Key - This field allows you to configure the Open AI API Key. You can register to obtain a free API key.
Model - This drop-down allows you to select the Open AI model you intend to use for providing completions. It can be one of the base models. The default and recommended selection is gpt-3.5-turbo.The base models are named according to the following conventions (they contain one of the following keywords): gpt (signals the most capable model), davinci, curie, babbage, and ada.
Go in the Smart Autocomplete view and choose Open AI for the Engine. The interface then displays the following features:
Continue writing Continue your current paragraph by generating a possible continuation.
Improve Readability Improve readability for the current selected DITA XML content.
Create Topic Create a DITA Topic starting from a general idea like for example Uninstalling an application named Oxygen XML Editor on Linux.
Short Description Create and insert a short description in the current DITA XML topic by summarizing the current selected content.
Index Terms Create and insert in the DITA topic's prolog a maximum of 10 index terms derrived from the current selected content.
Translate to French Translate the current selected content to French and replace the content with the French equivalent.
Readability Report Generate a Flesch-Kincaid readability and a Flesch–Kincaid grade level analysis from the current selected content.
Summarize Display a summary of the selected text.
